name: Dice the High Rollers
description:
Story

Welcome to dice town! You came just in time, the mayor -- Randy the dice -- needs your help getting rid of the pesky "High Roller" gang.  

Gameplay

At the start of each turn, the number of times you can move is determined by the value of the face that is pointing upward

Using said movements, roll into dice with an equal or lower face value to kill them, kill all of the High Rollers in a level to win!

Having difficulty with a level? as you gain more 'chips,' you can buy powerful cards from Randy to put the odds in your favor!
